charges.charge_description: 26:7212 endeavored to obstruct or impede the administration of internal revenue laws (AGGRAVATED OR FELONIOUS) (1)

charges.charge_disposition: to 33 months imprisonment on counts 1 and 2 to run concurrently and 12 months on each of counts 3,4,5,6,7 and 8 to run concurrently and concurrently with the sentence imposed in counts 1 and 3. Deft sentenced to 1 yr of supv release to run concurrently on all counts 1-8. (1)
